code: import{GET_FOLLOWS,CREATE_FOLLOW,DELETE_FOLLOW}from'../actions/types';import axios from'axios';export var getFollows=function getFollows(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('http://localhost:3000/follows').then(function(follow){return dispatch({type:GET_FOLLOWS,payload:follow.data});});};};export var deleteFollow=function deleteFollow(followid){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("http://localhost:3000/follows/".concat(followid)).then(dispatch({type:DELETE_FOLLOW,id:followid}));};};export var createFollow=function createFollow(postuser,currentuser){return function(dispatch){axios.post('http://localhost:3000/follows',{followee_id:postuser,follower_id:currentuser}).then(function(follow){return dispatch({type:CREATE_FOLLOW,payload:follow.data});});};};
